originalText.text: The man that work here is really nice and does a great job with my clothes. Everytime I need a zipper change, or clothes alteration he does his magic and gets my clothes back at a timely fashion pretty quick too. I have used these cleaners for 13 years and have always been happy with their service. Every morning he says hi to me right before he starts his shift. He does a great job removing stains and an expert tailoring as well. I've went to him with graduation clothes which he has fixed for me without a problem.

originalText.text: In all the times I've gone to this place, the guy in there has done a great job with all of my clothes. Great customer service, great job and very nice person as well. Ive used this cleaners for about 16+ years and the guys has always been attentive with my belongings. He is great at removing clothing stainds (old & new) and he is an expert on tailoring clothes to my liking. He is also very quick that i eont wait too long to get my clothes back.

originalText.text: I have never seen such a bad attitude cleaner ever! YOU DONT NEED to throw all my stuffs on the floor to check! And then told me you CANNOT wash them all. But that’s not the worst part yet, the worst part is throwing a trash bag into my face and asked me to pick them up myself! Don’t go there! We deserve a better cleaner place!

originalText.text: We've been using Charming Cleaners for laundry wash&fold and dry cleaning almost every week for several years.  We always had a good experience.

originalText.text: Worst experience ever at cleaners – they damaged my favorite shirt and the response was trowing me $3. His attitude is rude and unacceptable, everything wrong! Avoid–
